verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
What day is it?
And in what month?
This clock never seemed so alive.
I can't keep up,
And I can't back down;
I've been losing so much time.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
'Cause it's you and me
And all of the people
With nothing to do,
Nothing to lose.
And it's you and me
And all of the people,
And I don't know why
I can't keep my eyes off of you.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
What other things
That I wanna say
Just aren't coming out right.
I'm tripping on words;
You've got my head spinning.
I don't know where to go from here.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
'Cause it's you and me
And all of the people
With nothing to do,
Nothing to prove.
And it's you and me
And all of the people,
And I don't know why
I can't keep my eyes off of you.

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Something about you now
I can't quite figure out.
Everything she does is beautiful,
Everything she does is right.

verse.name: c3
verse.lines:
'Cause it's you and me
And all of the people
With nothing to do,
Nothing to lose.
And it's you and me
And all of the people,
And I don't know why
I can't keep my eyes off of...
you and me
And all of the people
With nothing to do,
Nothing to prove.
And it's you and me
And all of the people,
And I don't know why
I can't keep my eyes off of you.

verse.name: b2
verse.lines:
What day is it?
And in what month?
This clock never seemed so alive.
